div.bibl: Illinois Staats-Zeitung, Mar. 4, 1893. SCHILLER WOMEN'S CLUB.

body.p: The annual general meeting and election of officers of the Schiller Women's Club took place two days ago. The reports of all the officials were accepted. The financial report showed a balance of $1,217.15 in favor of the club. The membership has increased to seventy-seven. The amount of $202 was paid during the past year for sick benefits, etc. All officials of the previous season were reelected.
